title: "AI Wrote Better Phishing Emails Than Humans in a Recent Test"
excerpt: "This time, it's phishing emails. In a small study, researchers found that they could use the deep learning language model GPT-3, along with other AI-as-a-service platforms, to significantly lower the barrier to entry for crafting spearphishing campaigns at a massive scale."
